author: cms-sw
body:
PyTables enables avx2 instructions set if built on a machines with avx2 . This causes unit tests to fail if run on  machine without avx2. PR disable AVX2 for PyTables so make sure we can run it on any of our build nodes.

[a]
https://github.com/PyTables/PyTables/blob/master/setup.py#L888
title: Disable AVX2 for pytables
